entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

RAIN
HIGHS AROUND 50
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

RAIN WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE RISING INTO THE MID 50S AFTER MIDNIGHT
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
RAIN LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 50S IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING, THEN RAIN LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

RAIN LIKELY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE EVENING
LOWS AROUND 30
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
